channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Same as 8748907 that you said was fixed, 25th February
item.description:
Opposite side of road to 35 As you can see the tennis ball well below ground level, and your team "fixed" it last week. When in reality the left it and LOTS of other smaller holes

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnmeadow Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish accumulating in hedge, 25th February
item.description:
This rubbish started as just a couple of items but has steadily accumulated over time. Unfortunately, litter attracts more litter, and if itâ€™s not cleared soon it risks being perceived as an unofficial dumping spot. The most recent addition appears to be a quantity of charity donation bags, which have been left in the hedge rather than delivered. It may be worth notifying the relevant charity so they are aware of the issue. I would be grateful if this could be cleared before it worsens further. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Pastures Avenue, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
